column4: my kubuntu stucks on the blue kubuntu screen at booting, i had the saem yesterday and reinstalled afterwards, now i have the same proplem again, what could be the reason and what is a possible solution? kb 10.04 / kernel 1.6.32-24 / brand new installation
screen resolution boot into init 3 and check the logs
or you can startup in single user mode and change the run level to level 3
